facts.goalDesc: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day
facts.indicatorDesc: Proportion of population below the international poverty line, by sex, age, employment status and geographical location (urban/rural)
facts.seriesDesc: Employed population below international poverty line, by sex and age (%)
facts.fact_title: Employed population below international poverty line, by sex and age (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2005, 33.2 % of the country's workers and their families were living on less than 1.90 US dollars per person per day

facts.goalDesc: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions
facts.indicatorDesc: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line, by sex and age
facts.seriesDesc: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line (%)
facts.fact_title: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of population living below the national poverty line was 69 % in 1993.

facts.goalDesc: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
facts.indicatorDesc: Prevalence of stunting (height for age <-2 standard deviation from the median of the World Health Organization (WHO) Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age
facts.seriesDesc: Proportion of children moderately or severely stunted (%)
facts.fact_title: Proportion of children moderately or severely stunted (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2010, 50.3 % of children under age 5 had stunted growth

facts.goalDesc: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, end all forms of malnutrition, including achieving, by 2025, the internationally agreed targets on stunting and wasting in children under 5 years of age, and address the nutritional needs of adolescent girls, pregnant and lactating women and older persons
facts.indicatorDesc: Prevalence of malnutrition (weight for height >+2 or <-2 standard deviation from the median of the WHO Child Growth Standards) among children under 5 years of age, by type (wasting and overweight)
facts.seriesDesc: Proportion of children moderately or severely overweight (%)
facts.fact_title: Proportion of children moderately or severely overweight (%)
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under age 5 increased from 1.6 % in 2002 to 1.9% in 2010.

facts.goalDesc: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, end preventable deaths of newborns and children under 5 years of age, with all countries aiming to reduce neonatal mortality to at least as low as 12 per 1,000 live births and under-5 mortality to at least as low as 25 per 1,000 live births
facts.indicatorDesc: Under-five mortality rate
facts.seriesDesc: Under-five mortality rate, by sex (deaths per 1,000 live births)
facts.fact_title: Under-five mortality rate, by sex (deaths per 1,000 live births)
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under age 5 fell from 88.4 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 43.1 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.goalDesc: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases
facts.indicatorDesc: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex, age and key populations
facts.seriesDesc: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex and age (per 1,000 uninfected population)
facts.fact_title: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex and age (per 1,000 uninfected population)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , there were about 0.15 people in every 100,000 uninfected population that became newly infected with HIV.

facts.goalDesc: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, reduce the global maternal mortality ratio to less than 70 per 100,000 live births
facts.indicatorDesc: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.seriesDesc: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_title: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 1590 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 501 per 100,000 live births in 2015 .

facts.goalDesc: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, reduce by one third premature mortality from non-communicable diseases through prevention and treatment and promote mental health and well-being
facts.indicatorDesc: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease
facts.seriesDesc: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease (probability)
facts.fact_title: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease (probability)
facts.fact_text: The risk of dying between the ages of 30 and 70 from one of four main non-communicable diseases (NCDs) - cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease - fell from 25.7 % in 2000 to 23.9% in 2016.

facts.goalDesc: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys have access to quality early childhood development, care and pre-primary education so that they are ready for primary education
facts.indicatorDesc: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age), by sex
facts.seriesDesc: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age), by sex (%)
facts.fact_title: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age), by sex (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 16.19516 % of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school

facts.goalDesc: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
facts.targetDesc: Ensure women's full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life
facts.indicatorDesc: Proportion of seats held by women in (a) national parliaments and (b) local governments
facts.seriesDesc: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (% of total number of seats)
facts.fact_title: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (% of total number of seats)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 14.6667 % in 2000 to 22% in 2018.

facts.goalDesc: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
facts.targetDesc: Eliminate all harmful practices, such as child, early and forced marriage and female genital mutilation
facts.indicatorDesc: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 15 and before age 18
facts.seriesDesc: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 18 (%)
facts.fact_title: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 18 (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2010, 40.7 % of women aged 20 to 24 reported that they were married before their eighteenth birthday

facts.goalDesc: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services
facts.indicatorDesc: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology
facts.seriesDesc: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (%)
facts.fact_title: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , 16 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.goalDesc: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services
facts.indicatorDesc: Proportion of population with access to electricity
facts.seriesDesc: Proportion of population with access to electricity, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_title: Proportion of population with access to electricity, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 29.18 % in 2000 to 46.68% in 2016.

facts.goalDesc: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
facts.targetDesc: Sustain per capita economic growth in accordance with national circumstances and, in particular, at least 7 per cent gross domestic product growth per annum in the least developed countries
facts.indicatorDesc: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita
facts.seriesDesc: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (%)
facts.fact_title: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (%)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita increased from -2.48668 % in 2000 to 1.41444% in 2016.

facts.goalDesc: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, upgrade infrastructure and retrofit industries to make them sustainable, with increased resource-use efficiency and greater adoption of clean and environmentally sound technologies and industrial processes, with all countries taking action in accordance with their respective capabilities
facts.indicatorDesc: CO2 emission per unit of value added
facts.seriesDesc: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP (kilogrammes of CO2 per constant 2010 United States dollars)
facts.fact_title: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP (kilogrammes of CO2 per constant 2010 United States dollars)
facts.fact_text: The carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP decreased from 0.11014 kilograms in 2000 to 0.07578 kilograms in 2015.

facts.goalDesc: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
facts.targetDesc: Significantly increase access to information and communications technology and strive to provide universal and affordable access to the Internet in least developed countries by 2020
facts.indicatorDesc: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology
facts.seriesDesc: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology (%)
facts.fact_title: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 85 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.goalDesc: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management
facts.indicatorDesc: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter (e.g. PM2.5 and PM10) in cities (population weighted)
facts.seriesDesc: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities, urban population (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_title: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities, urban population (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameters (PM2.5) was about 42.3960494995117 micrograms per cubic metre . This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.goalDesc: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
facts.targetDesc: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums
facts.indicatorDesc: Proportion of urban population living in slums, informal settlements or inadequate housing
facts.seriesDesc: Proportion of urban population living in slums (%)
facts.fact_title: Proportion of urban population living in slums (%)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 1.73811 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 7.00201 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.goalDesc: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
facts.targetDesc: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements
facts.indicatorDesc: Forest area as a proportion of total land area
facts.seriesDesc: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (%)
facts.fact_title: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (%)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest declined from 15.6 % in 2000 to 14.95% in 2015.

facts.goalDesc: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
facts.targetDesc: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements
facts.indicatorDesc: Proportion of important sites for terrestrial and freshwater biodiversity that are covered by protected areas, by ecosystem type
facts.seriesDesc: Average proportion of Freshwater Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_title: Average proportion of Freshwater Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 0.02553 % in 2018 .

facts.goalDesc: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
facts.targetDesc: By 2020, ensure the conservation, restoration and sustainable use of terrestrial and inland freshwater ecosystems and their services, in particular forests, wetlands, mountains and drylands, in line with obligations under international agreements
facts.indicatorDesc: Proportion of important sites for terrestrial and freshwater biodiversity that are covered by protected areas, by ecosystem type
facts.seriesDesc: Average proportion of Terrestrial Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_title: Average proportion of Terrestrial Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 13.33668 % in 2018 .

facts.goalDesc: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
facts.targetDesc: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
facts.indicatorDesc: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex and age
facts.seriesDesc: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population (victims per 100,000 population)
facts.fact_title: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population (victims per 100,000 population)
facts.fact_text: In 2015 , the intentional homicide rate was 8.04 per 100,000 population .

facts.goalDesc: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
facts.targetDesc: Assist developing countries in attaining long-term debt sustainability through coordinated policies aimed at fostering debt financing, debt relief and debt restructuring, as appropriate, and address the external debt of highly indebted poor countries to reduce debt distress
facts.indicatorDesc: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services
facts.seriesDesc: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (%)
facts.fact_title: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (%)
facts.fact_text: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services increased from 0.00 % in 1994 to 3.59% in 2000.

facts.goalDesc: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
facts.targetDesc: Enhance North-South, South-South and triangular regional and international cooperation on and access to science, technology and innovation and enhance knowledge-sharing on mutually agreed terms, including through improved coordination among existing mechanisms, in particular at the United Nations level, and through a global technology facilitation mechanism
facts.indicatorDesc: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants, by speed
facts.seriesDesc: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants, by speed (per 100 inhabitants)
facts.fact_title: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants, by speed (per 100 inhabitants)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 0.01211 % of the population , up from nearly no coverage in 2008 .

facts.goalDesc: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
facts.targetDesc: Mobilize additional financial resources for developing countries from multiple sources
facts.indicatorDesc: Volume of remittances (in United States dollars) as a proportion of total GDP
facts.seriesDesc: Volume of remittances (in United States dollars) as a proportion of total GDP (%)
facts.fact_title: Volume of remittances (in United States dollars) as a proportion of total GDP (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2000 , the inflow of personal remittances was 0.47 % of GDP , up from 0.36 % in 1998
